typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Row as string,
		Country as string,
		Year as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Sales as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceSPLIT
sourceSPLIT split(Country=='USA' || Country=='UK',
	Country=='USA'||Country=='IND',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitCOUNTRY@(USAUK, USAIND, Default)
ConditionalSplitCOUNTRY@USAUK sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['usa_uk.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkUSAUK
ConditionalSplitCOUNTRY@USAIND sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['usa_india_csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkUsaIndia
ConditionalSplitCOUNTRY@Default sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['default.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkDefault
